page.title: Our Professional Services
page.description: From deep interior cleaning to professional exterior polishing, we treat every car with the care it deserves. Experience the difference with our premium detailing services.
page.readyDescription: Contact us today for a free consultation and quote on your next car detailing service. Our team is ready to make your vehicle shine — inside and out.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional Auto Detailing Services
services.description: We offer comprehensive auto detailing services to keep your vehicle looking its best.
services.readyDescription: Our team of experienced professionals is ready to help you with your needs. Contact us today for a consultation.
services.allPolishInclude: All polish services include polymer paint sealant for 6 months of protection

exterior-detailing.label: Exterior Detailing
exterior-detailing.subtitle: More Than Just a Wash
exterior-detailing.description: Basic car washes often use dirty sponges, harsh chemicals, or automated brushes that leave behind swirl marks, scratches, and miss hidden areas like grilles or door jambs. Our Exterior Detailing service is designed to do the opposite — it safely and thoroughly cleans every part of your car's exterior using pH-neutral products and precise hand techniques.
features: Wheels & tires deep cleaned with pH-balanced wheel cleaner
Detailed brush cleaning (grille, emblems, trim, fuel cap, etc.)
Door jamb cleaning (door jambs & trunk jamb)
Contact Wash (two-bucket method) with pH-neutral shampoo
Paint decontamination treatment (iron remover + clay bar/mitt)
Air blow & microfiber towel for drying
benefits: Safe for ceramic-coated, waxed & polymer sealed vehicles
Prepares vehicle for protection or polishing

faqs.question: What is included in exterior detailing?
faqs.answer: Our exterior detailing includes pre-wash, deep cleaning, clay treatment, and protective wax application.

faqs.question: How long does it take?
faqs.answer: Typically 2-3 hours depending on the vehicle size and condition.

paint-decontamination.label: Paint Decontamination
paint-decontamination.subtitle: Remove What Washing Can't
paint-decontamination.description: Even after a proper wash, your vehicle's paint can still feel rough or look dull. That's because microscopic contaminants like brake dust, industrial fallout, road tar, and tree sap embed themselves into your paint over time — and regular washing won't remove them.
benefits: Prepares surface for ceramic coating or wax
Helps prevent long-term damage from embedded grime

faqs.question: How often should I decontaminate my paint?
faqs.answer: We recommend every 6-12 months depending on driving conditions.

gloss-enhancer.label: Gloss Enhancer
gloss-enhancer.subtitle: Ultimate Paint Shine & Protection
gloss-enhancer.description: A great option for newer or well-maintained vehicles, our Gloss Enhancer service deeply cleans the paint and boosts shine — removing embedded contaminants like brake dust, airborne particles, and rail dust. Finished with a fine polish to bring out clarity and gloss.
features: Fine machine polish to boost gloss
6-month polymer sealant (optional if ceramic coating is selected)
benefits: Contaminants can dull your paint even without scratches
Gloss enhancer revives shine without harsh polishing
Keeps your car looking fresh between full corrections

faqs.question: How long does the gloss enhancement last?
faqs.answer: Results typically last 3-6 months with proper maintenance.

engine-bay-detailing.label: Engine Bay Detailing
engine-bay-detailing.subtitle: Comprehensive Engine Bay Cleaning
engine-bay-detailing.description: Your engine bay is one of the most overlooked areas in automotive detailing — yet it's one of the most impactful when done right. Our Engine Bay Detailing service focuses on a safe, meticulous approach without using high-pressure water. We protect critical components, remove built-up grime, and finish with a non-greasy dressing that restores a deep, clean factory look and long-lasting protection.
features: Full inspection & preparation of engine bay
Covering of sensitive components (fuse box, alternator, wiring, sensors, etc.)
Soft detailing brushes for tight spots
Low-risk cleaning only (no pressure washer used)
Application of non-greasy dressing that restores shine
Product application that provides UV protection
benefits: Adds professional touch to vehicle presentation

faqs.question: Is it safe to clean the engine bay?
faqs.answer: Yes, we take all necessary precautions to protect sensitive components.

headlight-restoration.label: Headlight Restoration
headlight-restoration.subtitle: Clarity, Safety & Style
headlight-restoration.shortDescription: Restore cloudy headlights to like-new condition.
headlight-restoration.description: Faded, yellowed, or hazy headlights don't just look bad — they also reduce night visibility and compromise safety. Our professional Headlight Restoration service brings them back to life using a multi-stage sanding and polishing process that restores clarity, shine, and light output.
features: Machine polishing to restore optical clarity
Ceramic coating application for long-term protection
benefits: Saves money (instead of costly headlight replacement)

faqs.question: How long does the restoration last?
faqs.answer: With proper maintenance, results can last 1-2 years.

headlight-taillight-tint.label: Headlight & Taillight Tint
headlight-taillight-tint.subtitle: Style, Protection & Custom Look
headlight-taillight-tint.description: Looking to enhance the look of your vehicle's front or rear lights? Our Headlight and Taillight Tint service adds a sleek, custom appearance to both headlights and taillights, while offering protection against UV rays, scratches, and oxidation. Choose from two bold shades, professionally installed with a 1-year warranty.
features: Precision-cut tint film in your choice of color
Professional installation with heat-shrinking for a seamless fit
1-year warranty against bubbling, peeling, or fading
benefits: Shields lights from UV, fading, & scratching
Backed by a 1-year no-fade, no-bubble warranty
Fully removable with no damage to factory lenses (maintains resale value)

faqs.question: Is tinting legal?
faqs.answer: We ensure all tinting meets local regulations and safety standards.
